definition: a ridge of land that separates two adjacent river systems, perform a division
details:
noun
- a ridge of land that separates two adjacent river systems
= synonyms: watershed
- a serious disagreement between two groups of people (typically producing tension or hostility)
verb
- perform a division
= example: perform a division
= synonyms: fraction
- force, take, or pull apart
= synonyms: separate
- come apart
= synonyms: separate
- make a division or separation
= synonyms: separate
- separate into parts or portions
= example: separate into parts or portions
= synonyms: split up
- act as a barrier between
= synonyms: separate
